name: Worry Herbs
description:
Self care is hard. Caring for plants can be easier. Perhaps, through the ritual of care for plants, we can learn to care for ourselves?

This is a meditative game featuring irregular card draws driven by a potted plant's need for water. Each draw prompts a self-examination question or creative exercise.

This game is still in the process of being edited. Once it has been thoroughly copy edited and at least one full playtest has been run, it will no longer be available for free.
